docs.text: the spy game is up .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you can thank charlie's angels -- the movie -- for that .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when did banality and pandering become okay ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: just steal from hong kong , the matrix , and a kitschy tv show from the mid-1970s and that's a movie ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: charlie's angels is one of the worst examples of action film homogeneity and shameless duplicity in any film i've seen in ages .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: charlie's angels is dumb .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: just plain dumb .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as we all know , three of the hottest females on the planet -- drew barrymore , cameron diaz , and lucy liu -- are three super-agents working for the mysterious millionaire named charlie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they all drive fast cars , look oh-so-fabulous even in the morning , and don't seem to get a scratch even when fighting armed men , having buildings explode ten feet in front of them , or flying through the air in matrix slow-motion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and while the entourage spends 90 minutes romping around in cleavage-busting wetsuits , cleavage-busting waitress uniforms , and cleavage-busting wet t-shirts , they scarcely succeed in resembling so much as a group of annoying , drunk sorority girls , the kind who hit on everybody at a party .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the actual plot revolves around the ridiculous story of a millionaire computer engineer -- the great sam rockwell -- who gets kidnapped by a mysterious rival computer company .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , the rival wants control of his new personal identification system , which involves such latter-day buzzwords as gps , cellular tracking , and even mainframe .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the amazing crispin glover lends his acting chops as a crazed henchmen involved in all the nasty things that happen to the angels -- like battling each of them in many round-robin matrix rip-off ( again ) fight sequences and harboring a strange attraction to sliced-off locks of the angels' hair .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the coup de grace is bill murray as bosley , serving as charlie's manservant , or , more to the point , the angels' pimp .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the rest of the movie comprises a revenge arc , enough costume changes to fill three productions of les miserables , carbon-copy fight sequences that would lend credible evidence to a jackie chan and the wachowski brothers lawsuit for intellectual property theft , and the strange transformation of sam rockwell into mickey rourke's long-lost brother .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: charlie's angels starts off with a bang and ends up being a soggy burrito left out overnight .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: nothing is difficult , plausible , or believable in any of the angels' actions .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it feels like the matrix , mission : impossible 2 , and cleopatra jones and the casino of gold all rolled into one .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: diaz is a knucklehead .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: barrymore is the " dangerous one , " mean and tough and about as believable as katie holmes in the role .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: liu is just . . .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: lucy liu , looking good in a skin-tight black leather suit .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the list of movies from which charlie's angels is directly lifted is equally astonishing .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the writers apparently ran the copier all night stealing scenes from armageddon , lethal weapon ii , all of jackie chan's movies , the great escape , saturday night fever , revenge of the nerds , payback , darkman , dr . no , the matrix ( as mentioned ) , and even tv's friends .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's a shame , too , because one of the many screenwriters , john august , was at the helm of last year's favorite , go .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then again , what can you expect from a director known solely as " mcg . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there is no camp value in the film , no interesting main characters , no invigorating action scenes , no reason at all to waste your time except to ogle the hot chicks and enjoy the performances of a few supporting players .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: note to hollywood : next time , let's leave the tv shows on the tv .
docs.label: negative
